name: Syzyf
overview: Syzyf is a timed puzzle-solving game, similar to Sokoban. The task requires making a passage to the evacuation point. There are two types of ground: standard and ice. Ice ground slides the vehicle to the first standard ground field. The cubes are divided into four types, two movable and two immobile. The first one moves just one field after pushing, the second one stops after contact with any obstacle, the third one may be only destroyed be using a bomb and the fourth one can't be removed at all. There are three types of vehicle visualization. The vehicle may carry an unlimited amount of bombs. The game consists a total of 80 levels. After each completed level the player receives a password. The game features a level editor for up to 15 boards.
